I Am Eva The

I specialize in contemporary art & culture

View My Work

What I do

Graphics, oil painting and all things organic and watercolor

Concepting

"Contemporary" is entirely possible only when we trace the concept's history and explore its underlying theme. I write texts to all my projects.

Exploration

It's my voyage of discovery and I produce both scientific records and imaginative responses to the unfamiliar lands that I encountered.

Craftsmanship

This is not craftsmanship with a dead hand, but craftsmanship continually receptive to new influences

Interaction

I want to make work that people care about. Work that hits them in that gut-punching, turn-their-world-upside-down way.

My Creative Process

All of my art projects are based of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Analyzing The Trends

I need to collect data for every project, so I read related news, articles and books, watch films etc. I try to understand everything that relates to the subject matter.

2

Finding Inspiration

To go deeper, I must develop spiritual roots and find strong connection to the project. It's time of lomography, oneiromancy and psychogeography.

3

Creating Artworks

This is the most important part of the creative process. It usually takes a lot of time to achieve my goals.

4

Presentation

I need to sum up all efforts and make the project complete. It should be easy for my art agent, galleries or curators to grasp my overall vision and where my work fits in with current contemporary art.
